mathematical operations
[scattered data-points for approximation (wtask)]


Functions

void surfit::wtask_transform (REAL shiftX, REAL scaleX, REAL shiftY, REAL scaleY)
 makes geometrical transform on surfit_wtask (shifting and scaling)
void surfit::wtask_inverse_transform (REAL shiftX, REAL scaleX, REAL shiftY, REAL scaleY)
 makes inverse to wtask_transform operation
bool surfit::wtask_filter_by_defarea ()
 removes all points from surfit_wtask for which surfit_defarea is undefined
bool surfit::wtask_filter_by_func (REAL eps)
 removes points from surfit_wtask, if , where (x,y,z) - surfit_wtask data points, f(x,y) - surfit_func value at point (x,y)
bool surfit::wtask_update_by_func ()
 sets points values to z = f(x,y), where (x,y,z) - surfit_wtask data points, f(x,y) - surfit_func value at point (x,y)
REAL surfit::wtask_minx ()
 returns minimum X value of all data-points
REAL surfit::wtask_maxx ()
 returns maximum X value of all data-points
REAL surfit::wtask_miny ()
 returns minimum Y value of all data-points
REAL surfit::wtask_maxy ()
 returns maximum Y value of all data-points
REAL surfit::wtask_minz ()
 returns minimum Z value of all data-points
REAL surfit::wtask_maxz ()
 returns maximum Z value of all data-points
bool surfit::wtask_add_noise (REAL std)
 adds noise distributed ad N(0,std) to surfit_wtask
REAL surfit::wtask_mean ()
 calculates mean value of all data-points in surfit_task
REAL surfit::wtask_std (REAL mean)
 calculates standart deviation from mean value (for surfit_task)
bool surfit::wtask_plus (wtask *wtsk)
 calculates A = A+B, where A - this class, B - another task
bool surfit::wtask_minus (wtask *wtsk)
 calculates A = A-B, where A - this class, B - another wtask
bool surfit::wtask_mult (wtask *wtsk)
 calculates A = A*B, where A - this class, B - another wtask
bool surfit::wtask_div (wtask *wtsk)
 calculates A = A/B, where A - this class, B - another wtask
bool surfit::wtask_set (wtask *wtsk)
 calculates A = B, where A - this class, B - another wtask
bool surfit::wtask_plus_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = A+B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
bool surfit::wtask_minus_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = A-B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
bool surfit::wtask_mult_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = A*B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
bool surfit::wtask_div_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = A/B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
bool surfit::wtask_set_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
